scripts.build:vocablist: node packages/data-processing/scripts/generate-vocablist.js --sourceDir web/public/data/vocabs --output web/public/data/vocablist-source-catalog.ttl && node packages/data-processing/scripts/process-vocab.js --profiles web/public/data/profiles.ttl --source web/public/data/vocablist-source-catalog.ttl --type catalog --outDir web/public/export/_system/vocabularies --backgroundDir web/public/data/background
scripts.build:ensure-data: if [ ! -d web/public/data/vocabs ] || [ -z "$(ls -A web/public/data/vocabs/*.ttl 2>/dev/null)" ]; then echo 'No vocabs found in web/public/data/, using sample-data'; mkdir -p web/public/data/vocabs web/public/data/background && cp web/public/sample-data/vocabs/*.ttl web/public/data/vocabs/ && cp web/public/sample-data/profiles.ttl web/public/data/profiles.ttl && cp web/public/sample-data/manifest.ttl web/public/data/manifest.ttl && if [ -d web/public/sample-data/background ] && ls web/public/sample-data/background/*.ttl >/dev/null 2>&1; then cp web/public/sample-data/background/*.ttl web/public/data/background/; fi; fi && mkdir -p web/public/sample-data/background && touch web/public/sample-data/background/.gitkeep
scripts.build:all-export: pnpm build:clean-export && pnpm build:ensure-data && pnpm build:vocabs && pnpm build:vocablist && pnpm build:vocab-metadata && pnpm build:labels && pnpm build:search
